desc: Village Baby was started by us: Alexis, Kelli, and Meggie. We’re three moms who know just how wonderful and challenging having a baby can be. Our swaddle blankets are super large, extremely soft, and extra stretchy. Our patterns are one of a kind, designed by us! And they're sure to make you smile. Enjoy!

layout.text: Stretchy and soft for nursing, carseats, and more
